original_text: He saw the Negev desert in the south. He saw the valley that goes from Jericho as far as Zoar. Jericho is called ‘The city of palm trees’.
korean_text: 네겝과 종려나무의 성읍 여리고 골짜기 평지를 소알까지 보이시고

sentences.original_text: He saw the Negev desert in the south.
sentences.korean_translation: 그는 남쪽에 있는 네게브 사막을 보았다.

sentences.original_text: He saw the valley that goes from Jericho
